pulseCh1FlowHigh.title: Pulse CH1 Flow High Alarm
pulseCh1FlowHigh.description: Indicates if the flow on channel 1 is above the threshold

pulseCh2FlowHigh.title: Pulse CH2 Flow High Alarm
pulseCh2FlowHigh.description: Indicates if the flow on channel 2 is above the threshold

pulseOCFlowHigh.title: Pulse OC Flow High Alarm
pulseOCFlowHigh.description: Indicates if the flow on the OC channel is above the threshold

pulseCh1FlowLow.title: Pulse CH1 Flow Low Alarm
pulseCh1FlowLow.description: Indicates if the flow on channel 1 is below the threshold

pulseCh2FlowLow.title: Pulse CH2 Flow Low Alarm
pulseCh2FlowLow.description: Indicates if the flow on channel 2 is below the threshold

pulseOCFlowLow.title: Pulse OC Flow Low Alarm
pulseOCFlowLow.description: Indicates if the flow on the OC channel is below the threshold

pulseCh1Leak.title: Pulse CH1 Leak Alarm
pulseCh1Leak.description: Indicates a leak detected on channel 1

pulseCh2Leak.title: Pulse CH2 Leak Alarm
pulseCh2Leak.description: Indicates a leak detected on channel 2

pulseOCLeak.title: Pulse OC Leak Alarm
pulseOCLeak.description: Indicates a leak detected on the OC channel
